text.social.charmrepeat: Give it a rest, will you?
text.social.charmfailure: Am I supposed to be impressed?
text.social.apologyaccepted1: ...OK. Maybe things can be better in the future.
text.social.apologyaccepted2: This won't change what you did, but I'll try to move on.
text.social.apologyaccepted3: Forgiveness shouldn't come easy for things like this, but I'll try.
text.social.apologyaccepted4: I told myself I'd never forgive you, I think I'll take a chance though.
text.social.apologyaccepted5: I must be crazy, but maybe even you can have another chance.
text.social.examine1: is uncertain what to think of you
text.social.examine2: has a favorable opinion of you
